Reviews.Title: USAnotebook and the Dell Latitude CP
Reviews.Author: lindab "Daily Walker"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this refurbished notebook computer from [another store] just last week. In a matter of days, the package arrived at my door. The product has many extras I didn't expect: a PC modem in a double PC slot, a handsome Dell carrying case, a Dell manual installed on the computer, and others. ... It turned out to be a great buy for the money for me.

ProductInfo.Features:
Dell Latitude CP M233XT Notebook
Features 233-MHz Pentium MMX, 64 MB RAM, 4.1 GB hard drive
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Latitude CP M233XT Notebook (233-MHz Pentium MMX, 64 MB RAM, 4.1 GB hard drive)
